projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Caaring -  Cab Share App
projects.bodyText:
- A Cab Sharing web app made using **Django** for **VIT** Students. People can create a new cab or request to join an existing cab.
 - Added User authentication and password reset using **SendGrid**.
 - Deployed on **heroku** using **gunicorn**.
